name: Siobhán Campbell
bio: Poet Siobhán Campbell is the author of numerous pamphlets and collections of poetry, including The Permanent Wave (1996), The Cold that Burns (2000), That Water Speaks in Tongues (2008), Darwin Among the Machines (2009), and Cross-Talk (2009), which explores Ireland in the aftermath of its turbulent peace process. Originally from Ireland, Campbell has lectured in the MA and MFA programs at Kingston University.
